title: Basecamp Table Manager
objective: Learn how to define a table in an Electronic Data Sheet and to use Basecamp's
tools to transfer tables between the flight-ground and to view and modify
After defining the table in EDS and rebuilding the cFS target refer to exercises
in the Tutorial Document for how to use Basecamap's tools to manage tables

exercise.instructions:
1. At the end of the <DataTypeSet> add the TblFile_Payload and TblFile <ContainerDataType> as shown in the exercise window.

Refer to the Tutorial Document for more information.

1. At the end of the <RequiredInterfaceSet> add the TBL_FILE <Interface> as shown in the exercise window.

Refer to the Tutorial Document for more information.

1. In the <Implementation> section add the TblFileTopicId <VariableSet> and <ParameterMapSet> entries as shown in the exercise window.

Refer to the Tutorial Document for more information.
Read the exercise comment block for how to rebuild the target. There are no code changes for this exercise.
